intro:
Sovereign is a deck building card game where utilising the best strategy and building the strongest deck is crucial to victory. 

Playing cards from your hand into the active area increases your attack and money.
The central line consists of all the cards that you may buy using the money from the active cards.

Build the strongest deck and destroy your opponent!
cvals: Name %s costing %s with attack %d and money %s
gopts:
Choose action: 
P = play all 
[0-n] = play card
B = buy card
A = attack
E = end turn
Q = surrender
buyopts:
[0-n] = Buy that card
S = supplement 
E = End buying
